reviews.review:
Bioshock Infinite затягивает также, а возможно даже и похлеще чем первая часть франшизы. Это "стимпанковское ретро" захватывает с первых минут и не отпускает до конца. Как и в предыдущих частях музыкальное сопровождениевыше всех похвал, всегда нравилась музыка доносящаяся из радио, приятная будто с пошарпаных виниловых пластинок, добавляет эффект погружения в начало 20 века. Красивое графическое оформление в слегка карикатурном стиле тоже не вызывает придирок, конечно минусы есть, например пластилиновость NPC которые при приближении выдают пару фраз и делают пару неестественных движений, но всё это меркнет на общем фоне. т.к. игра всё равно замечательна. Объективно её оценка 8,5 из 10, потому что всё нравится, всё отлично, но мелкие недоработки всё же бросаются в глаза.
Но субъектино это 12 из 10, это просто изумительно, последний раз столько эмоций вызывала только концовка Batman Arkham City, я был шокирован и дрожь не покидала минут 10. Огромное спасибо Кену Левину за столь прекрасное творение как Bioshock.

Думаю что данная игра замечательно подходит под номинацию "Я не плачу, просто что-то в глаз попало".

Игра с первых минут захватывающая своей историей и не перестающая удивлять на протяжении всех  9-12 гимплейных часов . А своей концовкой способна не только оторвать от вашей души несколько слезинок , но и заставить долго думать обо всех произошедших в ней событиях и сюжете в целом . В Коламбии прекрасном городе отстроенном в небесах на летающих плотформах разворачиваеться какойто запредельное количество вещей , только на первый взгляд это история о том как вы спасаете из заточения  девушку с необычными способностями , на фоне же мы имеем темы россизма , социального неравинства , религии и квантовой физики . Стоит только начать обращать внимание прислушаться к аудио дневникам  и разгавором и все эти тему возникнут перед вами . Гемплей же в свою очередь предлагает огромный спектр боевых возможностей широкий набор пушек и вигоров , способность Элизабет открывать порталы для помощи вам , магнитные рельсы для быстрых перемищений по миру ,разнообразные враги с индивидуальным подходом ,ну и многое другое . Да и сама Элизабет евляеться одним из самы ярких персонажей года , живым человеком не только в катсценах но и в самом игровом процессе . Она любопытно рассматривает мир который ей был раньше недоступен , она разгаваривает с вами выражает свои эмоции и по возможности помогает . В игре есть немног минусов но эти мелочи не отменяют величее "Bioshok infinite"
This game is just SO good. All that needs to be said.

Comme tous les bioshocks, c'est encore une fois une pure merveille !

Graphiquement c'est vraiment agréable, même si les ombres sont parfois grossières (dégradé de couleur hasardeux).
Du point de vue audio c'est une vraie réussite tellement on est vraiment immergé dans ce monde fascinant. Le doublage français est vraiment convaincant et rarement dans un jeu, j'aurais vu un doublage aussi bon. Mais, le GROS GROS point noir c'est que le jeu principale est très bien doublé mais AUCUN DLC ne l'est actuellement et ça casse carrément l'immersion.
Le gameplay est exemplaire et vraiment on arrive à diriger notre personnage au poil.

Mais comme tout bioshock qui se respecte, l'histoire est un pure chef d'oeuvre, nan vraiment, une histoire aussi profonde et recherchée ... C'est juste excellent. Après avoir testé le premier avec une histoire au rebondissement incroyable, on se dit "nan c'est pas possible de faire encore mieux" et bah si, c'est possible et les devs nous le démontrent. Chapeau !

Comme de très (trop?) rare jeux, il faudrait être fou pour ne pas le tester !
Bardzo fajna gra polecam!
one of the best campaigns i have ever played, 10/10
Amazing Game! I really love the setting of Columbia. As a huge history nerd, this game's background and setting really gets me excited!

Когда люди говорят, что игры - баловство, не искусство и пустая трата времени, они явно не подозревают о существовании B:I. Infinite - потрясающая драма, поставленная Кеном Левином и силами Irrational Games. Вашему вниманию представляются: один из самых сложных и запутанных сюжетов в истории интерактивного искусства; харизматичные, интересные и живые персонажи, озвученные талантливейшими актёрами; невероятнейшая по своей сложности работа художников. Творение последних - суть БиоШока. Когда вы только попадёте в летающий город - Колумбию, вы не сможете оторваться от тех красот, что перед вами открываются. Режиссёр не гонит вас вперёд, давая насладиться этими пейзажами, чудесным дизайном, архитектурными произведениями, которые предложили художники. Посмотрите кадры из Infinite и сами убедитесь, насколько они восхитительны.

Eine superstimmungsvolle Grafik, die Kämpfe können zwar etwas haarig werden, aber allein der Story wegen ein Muss! Empfehlenswert ist es aber die Vorgänger auch gespielt zu haben. Auch die DLC's sind lohneswert! Bestes Storygame was ich bis dato gespielt habe.
I FUCKING LOVED THIS SHIT

J'ai décidé d'acheter Bioshock Infinite comme beaucoup, suite à une pub bien ficelée. Bien que les images présentes dans cette pub soient complètement absente du jeu, j'ai adoré. 
Tout d'abord, assez fan des fps simple à 4 touches et 2 boutons, j'ai été un peu sceptique quant à ma capacité à finir un jeu où je dois gérer non seulement des armes, mais une sorte de magie chelou à base de dopant... 

Avouons-le j'ai eu un mal fou à m'y mettre. Les premières heures de jeu, je me  suis même pris à regretter et le ranger dans la catégorie des jeux que je ne finirai jamais (kikou Dishonored). 

Au bout d'une poignée d'heure, réparties sur plusieurs jours à raison de 20 minutes par ci, 15 par là, je me suis rendu compte que j'étais simplement captivé par la relation entre Booker et Elizabeth, par les jumeaux, par l'ambiance sonore et graphique, par cette tombée aux enfers et l'impression d'être un pion dans quelque chose qui me dépasse. 

Au final j'ai passé un très bon moment dans ce jeu, la fin m'a soufflé somme pour beaucoup de monde. J'ai été presque choqué de voir une histoire qui tient la route dans un fps, avec un fond, un sens, un questionnement, bref... quelque chose qu'on retrouve plutôt dans des jeux d'un autre genre. A ce jour j'ai joué à peu de jeux qui m'ont autant enthousiasmé que Bioshock Infinite. 

A noter : à jouer impérativement en VO.
great game, loved it from start to finish, just wish it was a bit longer, i beat it way too fast

Uno de los mejores juegos que he jugado de seguro....tanto el desarrollo de la historia, como un final que nunca me lo esperaria. el ambiente que lo rodea y las habilidades,armas que estan a tu disposicion
un jeux avec longue durée de vie et passionnant
Kommt meines Erachtens nicht an den ersten Teil, oder sogar System Shock heran, ist aber mit SIcherheit eines der besten Spiele der letzten Zeit.

BioShock Infinite, ein Spiel das für mich einer Hommage an die vorherigen Bioshock-Titel entspricht. An allen Ecken des Spieles wird man an die Vorgänger erinnnert und grafisch ist das Spiel ein der besten, welches ich bisher gesehen hab. Daumen hoch!
Verdammt iss das Spiel geil, Wer auf Steampunk, eine verdammt gute Story ,Brutalste Action und Splatter steht iss hier genau Richtig, Es ist wie ein Film in dem ich die Hauptrolle Spiele
this game is so so good game i liked it and i hope bioshock 4 come faster
Fantastic.

This game was absolutely fantastic, and I have never been so immersed in a game prior, not even Skyrim! If you're looking for a game that has a rich story, excellent gameplay mechanics, and an overall great game, look no further!
fukn download this shit its sick
Отличная игра. Сюжет захватывает. Когда играешь, не хочется заканчивать. Одна из лучших игр в плане атмосферы. Must Have, однозначно.
Not as good as the first Bioshock but a great shooter nonetheless. Burial at Sea 2 is a solid DLC.
My brain is mashed potatoes now. Masterpiece!

Последняя часть серии BioShock берет свое начало примерно за 50 лет до прибытия самого первого героя в Восторг. 

[h1]Плюсы:[/h1]
1. Элизабет - это просто потрясающий персонаж, самый лучший и живой напарник из всех, что я видел в играх.
2. Великолепная стилистика.
3. Оригинальная озвучка оставлена не тронутой, но вышла отличная фанатская работа с Анной Молевой подарившей Элизабет с начало свою внешность, а теперь и голос. 
4. Сюжет.
5. Динамика боев - добавили аэротрассы и крюки.
6. Новые плазмиды и оружие, ощущения и комбинации совершенно новые.
7. Атмосфера в городе и ее изменение по ходу сюжета.

[h1]Минусы:[/h1]
1. стелса нет... вообще нет (можно прийти в мирную локацию и не провоцировать ни кого, но в итоге все закончится перестрелкой).

DLC Burial at Sea обязательны к приобретению, ибо они расширяют и гармонично завершают историю, сплетая воедино все части серии.
просто супер!11 а концовка ничё так, где-то уже видел похожую

Amazing story, fun gameplay. Totally caught off guard near the end. If you plan to get it, get it with the DLC. TRUST

If you don't believe me, here's some more reason on why to get the game,

1. Elizabeth
2. Elizabeth
3. Elizabeth

Short and sweet, if you enjoy masterwork story telling matched by great gameplay, buy this game. This is the first game in years to emotionally pull me in. An absolute masterpiece by itself , when you add the DLC you are looking at one of the greatest games ever made.

+Stunning Visuals
+Strong female character

+Solid voice acting
+Prospective changing story
+Unique gun/magic play
+Worth its weight in gold

-The game ends 
- I wish Burial at Sea Episode 1 was longer
-/+ Completely consumed my free time

The best part of this game is the story which was really well crafted and a little too smart for most of the plebs who play this game haha :P

But the gameplay was also a lot better than the first two shitty games which were way too hard for anybody to actually enjoy which is why they only sold like 100 copies each. The part where the [spoilers]Anna[/spoilers] girl throws u stuff was the best part of the game cos it meant u couldn't die just like in real life when I blaze it up and play in traffic.

After loving Bioshock and being so disappointed with Bioshock 2 that I couldn't finish it, I was incredibly excited to hear about the release of Bioshock Infinite. It took me forever to afford a computer capable of running it, but once I was able to, I was amazed at first. The game's gunplay is a little clunky, but other gameplay elements made up for it.

And then a particular boss encounter - if you can even call it a boss encounter - utterly and completely ruined the game. Buttressed on either side by pointless backtracking, you are screamed at by insane audio, bewildered by a suddenly utterly unrealistic nonsense character, and left at least in my case with no choice but to restart again and again scrounging for freshly respawned ammo to do another few ticks of damage to the damn thing. It doesn't get better from there.

I haven't been able to work up the drive to just finish the game. I don't know how long it will be until I do. I doubt I'll bother with the next Bioshock title.
Great stuff

Wow...proste wow...táto hra bola pre mňa zážitok ju hrať najlepšia hra na svete pre mňa a nikdy na ňu nezabudnem, ak nemáte hru BioShock Infinite ľutujte! Neskutočná grafika, prostredie a príbeh. Stále na ňu myslím je úžasná. 100/100 BODOV- kupujte, a nebudete banovať.

This game is perfection, IMO the best game of the last console generation. 5/5
"Wer das nicht spielt ist doof"

Probably the best "self-contained arc" game I have ever played. Can't stress enough how much this game achieves in terms of immersion, deep complex story telling and effective ending. It actually makes you care about its characters in a very short spam of time. Elizabeth comes across actualy helpful, not annoying and with a solid bond with the main character so everything actually flows well in this game. Love the gameplay itself, tho some people didn't care for it. It felt challenging enough to me but not so much so that I would feel discouraged, and I'm not that good at FPS's. Also, Bioshock Infinite is positively STUNNING. Fantastic to look at from the first 10 minutes you power up the game. I just love it. All of it. 5 out of 5 for sure. I hope to replay it a lot of times in the future.
Wunderschönes Spiel mit toller Grafik und bewegender Story

Decir Bioshock es hablar de calidad. lo demostraron con el 1 y con este Infinite han vuelto a lograr que nuestros sentidos viajen a un lugar tan utopico como misterioso llamado Columbia.

Una experiencia que tienes que probar, sentir y disfrutar por ti mismo, cualquier cosa que pueda decirte no sera ni la decima parte de lo que sentiras jugandolo.

PD: Diria que es casi imprescindible el season pass por el tema de los dlcs de panteon marino (episodio 1 y 2) que continuan la historia tras el juego original, acabo de pasarmelos y son magistrales a nivel argumental y mas de un WTF te llevas garantizado. Lo dicho, en rebajitas pillaos el complete pack que merece y mucho.

Sensazionale! Un obbligo per tutti gli amanti degli sparatutto e un must per i fan della saga.
Armi spettacolari, plasmidi devastanti, grafica mozzafiato e divertimento stra-assicurato.

Kupiłem w jakiejś wyprzedaży za niewiele, ale szczerze powiem, że raz jeszcze bym nie kupił.
Dla mnie mechanika tej rozgrywki i styl artystyczny zwyczajnie nie zachwycają. To kwestia gustu, wiem.
Wiele osób uznaje to za dzielo sztuki samo w sobie, nie odmawiam im tego. Gra ma niepowtarzalny styl pod każdym względem.

Próbowałem się do niego przekonać i nie udało mi się. Rozgrywka jest zbyt schematyczna po jakimś czasie, niezależnie od kolejnych poziomów. Jak kupowac, to tylko w wielkiej przecenie >75%

Ein wirklich sehr sehr gut gelungenes Game, das viele Details, schönheiten und fantasiegrafiken aufweist, was ich wirklich sehr gut gelungen, im Einklang mit der Story, finde.
Bei dem Einfachen Auftrag ein Mädchen aus einem Turm zu holen wird man in ein sehr wirres Abenteuer voller Shootingaction und Magie gebracht, teilweise muss schon arg nachgedacht werden (insbesondere am Ende), um die Story wirklich zu verstehen.
Auch wenn z.B. Songbird, der eigl. größtenteils ein Feind war, stirbt empfindet man Trauer.
Es gibt dort mehr als nur eine Welt, die man durch sogenannte "Risse" in der Marterie betreten kann, von denen es mehr als nur ein paar Millionen gibt.
Mann kann das Spiel als Booker DeWitt schwer erklären, deswegen kann ich nur empfehlen selbst einen Blick in die wirre Welt über der unseren zu werfen!

This game is excellent! The story is phenomenal, the graphics are stunning and the world is fun to explore.  The game runs as smooth as it looks.  I highly recommend this game to everyone, regardless of what type of gamer you are.  This is an adventure well worth every penny, yet not worth missing out on!

Most people already know about [i]Bioshock: Infinite[/i]. They know that it's one of the most popular games of recent history, and know a lot about the gameplay. So my review is going to be a bit specialized in a way. As an academic that works on video games, I heard some negative things about this game in academic journals and from talking to others. I want to reflect on some of the interesting things about the game. It's hard to do "pros" and "cons" for such an amazing and beautiful game, but there are some things to discuss:

[u]One of the most beautiful games I've played[/u]: I mean this in terms of graphics, setting, and emotional investment. Columbia is wonderfully bright and vivid, contrasting sharply to the Rapture of the earlier titles in the series. Columbia is also a living and thriving community, making the world feel less lonely and isolating. This has positives and negatives: while it offers something new to explore, it also deviates from the paranoid feelings provoked by Rapture.

[u]It gets boring[/u]: I never thought that I needed to rush through [i]Bioshock 1[/i]. I even resisted such a feeling during [i]Bioshock 2[/i], despite the fact that it was so similar to its prequel. That being said, it might be a good thing that we are probably not getting another Bioshock game. Infinite is engaging, tantalizing, and fun. However, it also gets incredibly repetitive. I feel like I've done these tasks before, over and over again. The game started to get so devoid of purpose or point as I neared the end that I just wanted to rush through to see the ending. The ending is amazing. I cried. But getting there gets tedious. 

[u]Daisy Fitzroy is not developed in any coherent way (along with some other characters)[/u]: Previous games in the series did a great job criticizing all sides of the political spectrum: conservative (Andrew Ryan), liberal (Sophia Lamb), and revolutionary (Atlas). Infinite tries to do this formula again, and fails. The Vox Populi don't operate in any interesting or coherent way. They are background noise. Despite Elizabeth constantly saying that Daisy is "just like Comstock" and evil, I didn't feel that at all until one important moment later in the game. The game ignored Daisy's background story, even while repeating it constantly. It seemed irrelevant and Daisy ends up just seeming deranged in a way that is never quite explained. Bioshock usually does a good job exploring all dimensions of political positions; Daisy, however, just becomes a caricature.

One thing I especially didn't understand here is that Elizabeth constantly criticizes Daisy for her violence, while Booker is much more violent and much more destructive (killing indicriminately, uninterested in any ethical reflection) in ways that makes sense for his character, but not a coherent story).

[u]In some ways, much more story-driven than the previous Bioshock games[/u]: While all three of the games are story driven, Infinite sometimes lapses into movie. This is especially apparent at the end. While I was emotionally invested in the ending, a lot of traditional gamers may be unhappy with the endless narrative descent into nothing and the fact that there is no traditional "boss." That being said, the boss that is offered is pretty challenging.

Alın, İngilizceniz kötüyse türkçe altyazıyı indirin, sonra başkasını çağırın ve oynatın. Siz sadece oturup izleyin. 50 inception gücünde beyin amc*klaması yaşıyorsunuz sonunda. Atmosferi olsun, hikayesi olsun muhteşem. Oynanış açısından belki biraz sıkıntı yaşayabilirsiniz ama aten oyun olarak görmeyin bunu. Yanıznıda Elizabeth var, uçan şehir Columbia var... İndirime girdiği anda çökün derim.

a beautiful scenery, and a nice gameplay, you should play this game!!

The main thing that distinguishes BioShock Infinite against the background of most high-profile novelties of recent times is the amazing wholeness and unity of all elements of the game. There is nothing superfluous here - neither the "pasted" RPG-component, nor the far-fetched plot turns. Gameplay, script, graphics, music in synchronic sound create a truly stunning Steampunk atmosphere.

[i]The level designers have done a great job.[/i] [b]The external appearance of Colombia will make the hearts of even the most demanding graphics enthusiasts tremble.[/b] 
[i]Locations are diverse, the scenery throughout the passage constantly changing, each square meter of the city is full of some small details. I want to walk around this world, peering into every corner, listening to all the dialogues of random passers-by, looking through sets of funny pictures in each kinetoscope.[/i]

[h1]My opinion:[/h1] 
Pros: Stunning design; An exciting atmosphere; Interesting story; Images of characters; Dynamic skirmishes; Beautiful Elizabeth.

Cons: Aren't you ashamed to look here!?

Another fact is that i won´t play it again (ok probably in some month or years again; Played Wolfenstein 7 or 8 times in 3 weeks) because it makes no fun -.- I think if you like the story and the game it will be your Number-One-Game but you will never touch it again if you didn´t like it.

As a gamer, I was of course excited to hear about another BioShock title in development, but I was skeptical towards its potential success. Upon release, BioShock: Infinite was praised with positive reviews that I personally noted, but they did not alter my skepticism. How wrong was I? Completely. Totally. Utterly. Rarely does any medium of entertainment--from books to movies---challenge my perceptions or affect my emotions. BioShock: Infinite did and I'm not sure why. The game is a virtual rollercoaster ride that mixes strong dramatization, story, characters and new gameplay mechanics that build up another one of Ken Levine's twisted dystopias. The game also offers one of the most compelling non-playable characters (NPCs) to date that will ultimately lure you into the world of BioShock. The game is beautiful, varied and philosophical in its representation. BioShock: Infinite has displaced the Mass Effect series as my all-time favorite game which is a statement unto itself considering the length of one game versus a trilogy. You owe it to yourself to enjoy the BioShock experience!
Great game defenatly 10/10. The end really pulled me in the blew my mind.

There is not much that I can say that has yet to have been said about Bioshock Infinite, so I will keep it short and sweet. If you have yet to play this game you are missing out, big time! Not only is it a great story, but it is an experience. It pulled me back into gaming after I got in a sort of slump. It is a world that enjoy returning to time and time again. What a loved about this game: the world, the characters, the atmospher, the emersion of that time period. Play this game now, it will be worth it.
BioShock Infinite met my expectations.  It has a strong story and above average gameplay.
Such a good story. fuckin amazing. get it

Bioshock Infinite what can I say about this game? 
It’s amazing, visually stunning and the story is a mind-fuck literally. I couldn’t tell what was going on myself. Whoever thought of this is brilliant. I’d like to start things visually. The graphics are is amazing I would like to would have played it at Ultra but my PC wouldn’t handle such stunning visuals however I’ve managed and to succeed the game at ‘Very High’ which is close. The graphics any object, human or AI is detailed and it’s just wow. They have put so much effort into this game. The story well-thought out. Even though, I know the story of what’s going on. You literally have to listen to every dialogue, voxphone or anything you can hear or see to know what is going on because you do find yourself getting stuck while in cut-scenes or when a main protagonists or villains are talking. The gameplay was overall okay. The walking was buggy and the guns were good. But I didn’t feel like the gameplay not visuals or story was that good. The Vigors wow some were more interesting than others but wow. I will be defiantly be playing the story again it’s not that long or too short It’s just right. 
Buy it and Play it. Its worth on any platform as-long as you got free-time and good audio quality because I would give this game:

         9.8

Me ha encantado Bioshock Infinite así como sus DLC que conectan perfectamente con las entregas de Bioshock 1 y 2. Aparte de la brutal trama y la jugabilidad, llaman mucho la atención sus efectos, guiños constantes al jugador y el cariño que les vas cogiendo a los personajes. Para mi es y siempre sera de mis favoritos.

Primeiramente, não joguei o jogo pela steam, por isso consta como 1.7 horas jogadas apenas, mas zerei o jogo duas vezes e formei uma boa opinião sobre jogo. Com um ótimo ritmo, sem ser frenético mas também nunca monótono,o jogo conta com uma das melhores (se não for a melhor) histórias que eu ja vi em um videogame. sou apaixonado pela ambientação de 1920, e Columbia realmente tem um ambiente muito imersivo, com seus diferentes bairros, recriando fielmente uma cidade da época (desconsiderando o fato dela voar né kkkkkkkkk). Quem procura o clima sombrio e tenso de rapture deve se decepcionar, pois essa não é a proposta de infinite.
 Sua teoria de dimensões paralelas é extremamente bem construída e introduzida no jogo, e vai além de um elemento na história, com uma interferência real na jogabilidade na forma das tears, que destacam o jogo de outros do gênero.
 Ele não se destaca como shooter,afinal esse não é o objetivo do jogo, mas o combate não decepciona.  O sistema de combate é mais equilibrado que os jogos anteriores, e conta com mecânicas interessantes como a necessidade de trocar de arma frequentemente, e só poder escolher duas armas, que leva você a tentar criar a combinação que mais se adapta ao seu estilo de jogo (hand gun+carabine ou hand gun+sniper, no meu caso).
Outro diferencial do jogo são os tradicionais poderes do personagem, agora com o nome de Vigors, que enriquecem o gameplay, permitindo até a combinação de dois vigors diferentes.
 Apesar de não ser tão revolucionário quanto o primeiro Bioshock, esse jogo é talvez até melhor que os outros dois, e outras produtoras tem muito a aprender com Infinite. vale cada centavo gasto. Comprei na steam quando ja tinha zerado as duas vezes, apenas para prestigiar a 2K e o Ken Levine. Ele não é muito longo, mas talvez seja para conseguir manter o ritmo adequado sem "encher linguiça".
Como os outros bioshocks, ele também traz uma série de debates filosóficos, que enriquecem a experiência de jogo, e o diferenciam de outros jogos do gênero. Recomendo o jogo para quem procura um shooter satisfatório, mas quer também uma história elaborada, e uma ambientação original.

A great continuation of the series, yet you do not need to have played 1 and or 2, you will still be confused and wonder. The story is interesting and strange, very strange. Even the ending lets you wonder. The graphics are great, the gameplay is smooth, the enemies interesting and the gunplay a lot of fun. You can play it with a challange or just casual. I suggest to anyone who loves FPS story SP only games to get this one. Though, as it is a bit older at the point of writing this. I suggest to get it for a decent discount price. Right now it is $30 but once it goes below $20 it is well worth it.

Interesting story line, although I did not feel too immersed within the city of Columbia. Kinda felt like I was there for five minutes and then was led through a few hallways to the end. Anyway, fun gameplay, although felt pretty easy. Just loot anything and everything and kill shit.

The story was so amazing that it kept me up at night thinking about it so much that I missed my bus back home the next morning. The extra $40 for a last minute seat on a bus home was worth the amazing story in this game

SAGENHAFT !!! großartige Atmosphäre, wunderschöne und durchdachte visuelle Ausarbeitung und eine interessante Story die am Ende leider unnötig abstrakt wird, sich durch die faszinierenden Protagonisten aber trotzdem gut präsentiert. Die DLCs sind genauso empfehlenswert.
